activeStep.description: Set the active step (zero based index). Defines which dot is highlighted when the variant is 'dots'.

backButton.description: A back button element. For instance, it can be a Button or an IconButton.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

nextButton.description: A next button element. For instance, it can be a Button or an IconButton.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

dotActive.conditions: variant="dots" and this is the active step

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.dot: The component that renders the dot slot.
slotDescriptions.dots: The component that renders the dots slot.
slotDescriptions.progress: The component that renders the progress slot.
slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root slot.
